properties.name: DBProxyEndpointName
properties.description: The identifier for the DB proxy endpoint. This name must be unique for all DB proxy endpoints owned by your AWS account in the specified AWS Region.

type.description: The identifier for the DB proxy endpoint. This name must be unique for all DB proxy endpoints owned by your AWS account in the specified AWS Region.

properties.name: DBProxyName
properties.description: The identifier for the proxy. This name must be unique for all proxies owned by your AWS account in the specified AWS Region.

type.description: The identifier for the proxy. This name must be unique for all proxies owned by your AWS account in the specified AWS Region.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: An optional set of key-value pairs to associate arbitrary data of your choosing with the DB proxy endpoint.

type.description: An optional set of key-value pairs to associate arbitrary data of your choosing with the DB proxy endpoint.

properties.name: TargetRole
properties.description: A value that indicates whether the DB proxy endpoint can be used for read/write or read-only operations.

type.description: A value that indicates whether the DB proxy endpoint can be used for read/write or read-only operations.

properties.name: VpcSecurityGroupIds
properties.description: VPC security group IDs to associate with the new DB proxy endpoint.

type.description: VPC security group IDs to associate with the new DB proxy endpoint.

properties.name: VpcSubnetIds
properties.description: VPC subnet IDs to associate with the new DB proxy endpoint.

type.description: VPC subnet IDs to associate with the new DB proxy endpoint.

properties.name: DBProxyEndpointArn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the DB proxy endpoint.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the DB proxy endpoint.

properties.name: Endpoint
properties.description: The endpoint that you can use to connect to the DB proxy. You include the endpoint value in the connection string for a database client application.

type.description: The endpoint that you can use to connect to the DB proxy. You include the endpoint value in the connection string for a database client application.

properties.name: IsDefault
properties.description: A value that indicates whether this endpoint is the default endpoint for the associated DB proxy. Default DB proxy endpoints always have read/write capability. Other endpoints that you associate with the DB proxy can be either read/write or read-only.

type.description: A value that indicates whether this endpoint is the default endpoint for the associated DB proxy. Default DB proxy endpoints always have read/write capability. Other endpoints that you associate with the DB proxy can be either read/write or read-only.

properties.name: VpcId
properties.description: VPC ID to associate with the new DB proxy endpoint.

type.description: VPC ID to associate with the new DB proxy endpoint.
